title: Sivir's Mana Problem
body:
Is R.i.d.i.c.u..l.o.u.s

She can be the healthiest champ ever if you just fix her mana problem riot.

replies.body:
Build Essence Reaver into Phantom Dancer or Statikk Shiv for damage and mana restoration.  The more often you crit, the more mana you will restore.

If you are still having issues, consider changing to Meditation from Executioner in masteries.
It's like Riot doesn't want Sivir to build Crit XD

No, lower the mana cost then you'd have to increase the cooldowns on abilities.

Otherwise you're forever pushed into tower and sivir + her support can go make a quick roam and return by the next wave.
God forbid we have another adc champion worth picking outside of {{champion:51}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:29}}

im pretty sure twitch is getting nerfed, vayne is already kinda eh eh now from her last nerf, now shes alright instead of "omg i have to pick cause too op" that resides with caitlyn i think... and i don't see jinx often.

Besides i think people are slowly starting to pick tristana again.
they gave her mana restoration that doubles as an ability shield. What more do you want

The world is losing it's ability to mana control.
